channel.title: Removing Customs?
channel.description: How can I remove some useless customs, such as Bandos Whip? Using an edited Bluurr's Client.

item.title: Removing Customs?
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Just remove all the customs, replace the cache with a fresh one, and add the customs you want to keep.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing Customs?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“GrimReapersScythe, post:3, topic:306029”][quote author=DPreborn link=topic=402223.msg2980956#msg2980956 date=1254604944]
class8.java

Just search for “Bandos Whip”

Delete the ints of bandos whip.

[/quote]

Deleting the ints only makes the client not recognize the whip, to fully delete, look at the ints before deleting, take the model numbers, delete those from the models folder, then check the source for the item’s id inside the item.cfg and item.java.[/quote]
It will still be in the cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing Customs?
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

[quote=“DPreborn, post:2, topic:306029”]class8.java

Just search for “Bandos Whip”

Delete the ints of bandos whip.[/quote]

Deleting the ints only makes the client not recognize the whip, to fully delete, look at the ints before deleting, take the model numbers, delete those from the models folder, then check the source for the item’s id inside the item.cfg and item.java.

Read full topic
